attributes.action: End the 2nd and 8th day Covid tests after travelling
attributes.additional_details: When you arrive to the UK after travelling, you already have to have a negative covid test from wherever you came from and must then have a 10 day isolation period. Therefore the extra Covid tests are a waste of time, money and resources all of which could be used elsewhere.
attributes.background: Just have the PCR before travelling

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577612

We have also published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Review testing and self-isolation requirements for arrivals to England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568602
